channel.description:
# Badix Universe
![image|612x202, 100%](upload://kgFDepASBnc51I0hvdmCgLUkCAV.png)
>In response to the many NFT-based projects launched on Radix the Badix Universe has been created: a virtual economy/universe simulation game on the Radix ledger dedicated to providing NFTs with utility-based value! To kick off the project, 5000 unique playable NFTs have been generated. **Price of each NFT:** 50 XRD **Links:** * [Website](https://badixuniverse.com/) * [Collection](https://badixuniverse.com/collection.php) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/badixuniverse) * [Telegram](https://t.me/badixuniverse)
